issue.title: [CF 1063] Make the icons clickable
issue.body:
Hello,

Would it be possible to make the TellMeWhen icons clickable?

I think it would make the addon even amazier if we could associate an icon with a macro code to be executed when clicking the icon. For example, if we make an icon showing a spell, it would be wonderful if we could click it to actually cast that spell.

Thank you very much and congratulations for maintaining such a great addon!

KumoTaicho


> Posted by CurseForge user kumotaicho | Imported from CurseForge issue #1063 | Raw

comments.body:
Sorry for the duplicate. I made a research before creating the ticket but I didn't see that the result was filtered on open tickets by default (my bad).

Thanks for the very quick reply.

Keep up the good work!


> Posted by CurseForge user kumotaicho
